dcterms:creator: Shital Shah
Debadeepta Dey
Chris Lovett
Ashish Kapoor
dcterms:description: The Urban Minimum Altitude Dataset (UMAD) is a virtual-scene dataset created using the AirSim simulator, built on Unreal Engine. It aims to provide high-fidelity simulation data for urban environments, ensuring realistic texture details and accurate drone trajectory data.
dcterms:title: Urban Minimum Altitude Dataset (UMAD)

dcterms:creator: Haithem Turki
Deva Ramanan
Mahadev Satyanarayanan
dcterms:description: The Mill 19 dataset is utilized for evaluating NeRF-based localization methods. It is designed to support large-scale neural radiance field applications, providing a comprehensive environment for testing and validation.
dcterms:title: Mill 19
